# Third-party dependencies CMakeLists.txt
# This file provides CMakeLists.txt templates for all third-party libraries
# Users need to clone the actual source code into the respective directories

# Note: These are template CMakeLists.txt files. 
# You need to download the actual source code for each dependency.

# Recommended git clone commands:
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/zlib.git third_party/zlib
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/bzip2.git third_party/bzip2  
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/lzma.git third_party/lzma
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/zstd.git third_party/zstd
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/libdeflate.git third_party/libdeflate
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/libmd5.git third_party/libmd5
# git clone https://github.com/sisong/xxHash.git third_party/xxHash
